document_name: Signed Prodoc- Capacity Development in Project Management.pdf

donor_name: MINISTRY OF LOCAL GOVERNMENT, TRINIDAD AND TOBAGO
outputs.output_descr:
Expected Outputs:
1. 400 staff of the Ministry trained in PRINCE2
2. Increased awareness of Ministry staff of Results Based Management Systems
3.  Project Initiation Document for RBM 
4. Strengthened Institutional structures, mechanisms and systems within the Ministry

project_descr: Personnel of the Ministry of Local Government trained in a common Project Management Methodology and strategy for the development of a results Based management system prepared
